greeting1: Hey! I know you! You are a wanted criminal! Stop, in the name of the law!
pcTalk2: Sorry, I will comply. Here is the money.
pcTalk3: You are going to regret this, copper head!
npcTalk1: Don't play stupid with me! You have quite a sum attached to your head. It was <fine> gold, if I remember correctly. You better pay up right now, or you will meet my good friend here, Rusty the Sword.
